keyMoments.title: White-Barbed Iron Deathmatch Activated
keyMoments.description: Ohm, as one of God's Army's priests, activates his ultimate technique to trap all enemies in an inescapable barbed wire cage.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the power and ruthlessness of God's Army's elite forces.

keyMoments.title: Enel Defeats Raki
keyMoments.description: Enel, as the leader of God's Army, defeats another Shandian warrior with overwhelming power.
keyMoments.significance: Shows God's Army's dominance over the resistance forces.

goals: Eliminate all who oppose Enel's rule

keyMoments.title: Raki Defeated by Enel
keyMoments.description: Raki, one of the Shandian warriors, is defeated by Enel while Wyper watches helplessly, unable to break through the barbed wire to help her.
keyMoments.significance: Another devastating loss for the Shandian warriors in their centuries-long struggle.

keyMoments.title: Four Hundred Years of Shandian Suffering
keyMoments.description: The episode emphasizes that Wyper and the Shandian warriors carry the weight of four hundred years of displacement, fighting to reclaim their ancestral homeland.
keyMoments.significance: Provides crucial historical context for the Shandian warriors' determination and the stakes of their struggle.

keyMoments.title: Luffy Discovered Inside Nola
keyMoments.description: Luffy is found inside the giant snake Nola's stomach, his fighting causing the creature to rampage. Nami discovers this and is frustrated by his obliviousness.
keyMoments.significance: Classic Straw Hat chaos with Luffy's antics causing problems while he remains cheerfully unaware.

keyMoments.title: Zoro Commits to Fighting Ohm
keyMoments.description: Zoro strategically decides to defeat Ohm before attempting to rescue Nami, showing his tactical approach to combat.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the Straw Hats' growth in handling complex battle situations.
